ygData.subject: Re: Rambling a bit, was: Re: [EQ_women] Marriage question......
ygData.msgSnippet: Salutations Kristina!  I didn t get the
ygData.messageBody:
Salutations Kristina!

<< when you go to make your clothes you place all of
the ingredients in the box (minus the pattern) and hit
combine. >>

I didn't get the pattern the first time for some
reason, but I did combine and get the cloth. I thought
I was supposed to give it back to him. "Sigh"

<< This should result in some specially named piece of
cloth you place the fabric and the pattern inside a
loom/sewing kit and combine to get the armor. >>

Does this mean I can't make the armor until I get high
enough in my tailoring skill? How high should I be to
do that. I think my current level is about 17?
I have the same problem with my bow quest. I have
everything I need, but someone told me I needed to be
about 150 in fletching before I can be pretty sure of
making a bow. So, I just put everything in the bank to
await that day, if or when it arrives.

<< The only ingredients that you hand back to the guy
giving out the quests are the ones for the weapon
which is normally given after you ask for the
tunic/breastplate. >>

I got the weapon quest (sword), or at least was told
what I needed. Two Orc eyes and a Master Key. I've got
all this. Do I need to put in a special bag or just
hand them all to the guy and then get my sword?

<< As for getting ripped off on the Forest Drakling
Scale, I know how that goes. Those silly things out
not to be selling for more than 2-3pp, however, the
pristine are so rare and in such demand still that
people are selling them for as high as 50pp. >>

To be honest after several hours of game time and lots
of dead FD's I would not have minded that much if I
had at least managed not to turn around and throw it
all away.
:o/

<< Personally I wouldn't pay more than 5pp for a
regular or ruined FDS, or over 10pp for the Pristine
FDS. >>

Live and learn, and they did offer to trade, but I
didn't have what they wanted.

<< Scales in Misty Thicket are a different story.....
>>

Haven't even heard of Misty Thicket.

:o)
Brangvyne
13th lvl Wood Elf Ranger
